title: Navigate Ribbon Component through Keyboard Shortcuts – Power BI Ribbon Short Cuts
excerpt: Keyboard Shortcuts – Power BI Ribbon Short Cuts  In this video, we will discuss the Key tips for the new Power BI ribbon. With February update of Power BI Desktop, now we have keyboard shortcuts using which we can navigate in between Menuabar and other ribbon components.  In this video, we will cover
